basics.name: Tami Bar
basics.label: Freelancer : Maker : Human
basics.summary:
Fullstack Unicorn Developer - Love to make things happen and will learn what is needed to get it done. Over the years I've developed on various platforms, designing architecture and writing systems and apps for pc, mobile, web &libraries. 5-50-500

Currently looking for a part-time/student position as a Senior Python Developer - scope of 80 hrs a month, preferably from home. Also developing a Whatsapp-Automation platfrom. If that sounds interesting or you just like my skill-set please feel free to reach out 💜

work.summary: - At Magico we've built special gesture-based apps to enable users to interact with their digital surrounding using common smartwatches. Point to your lights to turn them on, "grab" the volume knob for far away and raise the volume, control your tv without a remote
highlights: Responsible for designing, implementing and testing the core technology of the company, throught all our various apps.

work.summary:
**·** Opened and maintained gateways for annonymous operations abroad
**·** Lab Setup, multi-servers Order, Setup, Operation, Burn
**·** Bitcoin
**·** Openvpn Chaining

**·** Designed and built an intelligence-based dashboard with novel features. Fullstack
**·** Lead team of 3 junior developers and 1 Senior Developer
**·** Entire System Architecture and Project Management
**·** Graph Analitics

**·** Assisted developing both the back/front end of the platform, & social campaign operations.
**·** First touch with back and front end
**·** Multiple account and content handleing
